TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_cabay, title = cabay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/cabay} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:好友；同學) u cabay nu maku ci Taymu. Taymu 是我的同學. kisu ku cabay nu maku a tayza i sawali. .
(kamo no holam:好友；同學) o cabay no mako ci Taymo. Taymo 是我的同學. kiso ko cabay no mako a tayza i sawali. .
